title: GO SMS Pro Find Phone plug-in
creator: ZT.art

extendedInfo.description: GO SMS Pro Find Phone plugin is designed to protect your phone and private info:1. Find your lost phone by locating or alarming it.2. Lock your phone,erase private data,ring to alarm by sending commands via your security phone number.3. Even if the SIM card is changed,it will also send a message to your security phone number to let you know the replaced number.Main features:- Locate the phone- Lock the phone- Remote erase private data when phone is lost- Sim card change notification- Ring to alarmHow to download and install the Find Phone plug-in?- Click the Find Phone icon in the GO SMS Application Center and follow the tips to download and install.** Tips **- Please set a safe number before useï¼- Find Phone runs with GO SMS Pro v4.51 version or above.*Related website:- Download the newest GO SMS Pro: Search âGO SMS Proâ in google market.- Visit our Blog: http://gosms.goforandroid.com- Email to us: gomessanger@gmail.com- Visit our facebook: http://www.facebook.com/apps/application.php?id=178919808825035Thank you very much for your support.

reviews.title: PERFECT!
reviews.comment: This app is amazing!!! I tested everything it\'s capable of & it all worked great!!! Thank you for creating this app! Really comes in handy
reviews.author: Karina Castillo

reviews.title: So far not so good.
reviews.comment: I haven\'t downloaded this application even 20 minutes ago and, it keeps freezing when I test out the alarm...uninstall!
reviews.author: Angelina An\303\251zil

reviews.title: Setup???
reviews.comment: There is NO way to setup the app! I can\'t set my password. There\'s no option or button for \"settings\". It Just asks for my password and explains how to use it. I am guessing it\'s not compatible with the Samsung Note II. Found another app that works great!
reviews.author: Hakim Muhammad

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: You should be able to make a word password,  not just make it numerical
reviews.author: David Sandoval

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Fully working..  easy to use..  user friendly gui..  I love it so much..
reviews.author: Shendy Aditya Syamsudin

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: It wont let me set my password. It keeps saying 6 digits.
reviews.author: Robert D Cumberledge Jr

reviews.title: Love/hate!
reviews.comment: I love the theame but hate all the spam notifications!
reviews.author: April Mankiewicz

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: So simple to use, and unlike antiviruses or apps made to track phones this one is invisible to prying eyes. Tested lock and track and both were snappy. All my friends wanted the same app, got more downloads, just love it!
reviews.author: mireya white

reviews.title: F***ing awesome
reviews.comment: You can only open it through an app manager or Google market. But Nothing works better. Period. I\'ve tried at least a dozen, and this is by far the best.    I just used it to find my phone after it fell of the top of my car. It\'s the only lock/locate app that works with go SMS properly. I used a friends smart phone But you can use your go SMS account (after setup) to lock and find your phone.   LCK#   LOC#   ALM#
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I think this will a usefull app, when my phone is stolen..
reviews.author: Agung Atmadi

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: I have a problem with people taking my phone without my permission.  This is great for me. Now I can lock it once I notice it\'s gone or alarm it when I mis place it
reviews.author: Demetria Lindsey

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Very usefull...
reviews.author: Gen Cequena

reviews.title: For those having problems
reviews.comment: I have tried a couple different phone locating apps and this one is the only one that all of the functions work. Opening the app and location seem to be the 2 biggest complaints. To open go to the sms text app open it then swipe to the right to get to sms applications the find phone app is in there. The location addresses will almost always be wrong because they are using google maps as do all phone locating apps. Try using the street view on google maps when it sends you the gps coordinates
reviews.author: rob beam

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Love this app
reviews.author: Teera Smith

reviews.comment: Works great on my Droid Razr M.

reviews.title: Find phone
reviews.comment: Works great

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: Just wow. I love it it works great with my note. Watch out thief\'s hehe lol

reviews.comment: Vry nice app

reviews.comment: how to remote your phone using other phone?..please help I dont know how to use the commands

reviews.title: how does it work?
reviews.comment: How does it work? just makes me download another app which gives a different view of SMS directory,  What sthat got to do with finding a lost phone?
